spec:
When building locally create local maven artefacts (jar file and sources) 
the artefact should be org.incept5:correlation:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
when pushing commits to main then the maven artefacts should be published to "https://jitpack.io" and the build number should be incremented on successful build to org.incept5:correlation:1.0.<buildNumber>
commitMessage:
Configure Maven publishing for local builds and JitPack integration

- Fixed group ID from "orge.incept5" to "org.incept5"
- Set artifact ID to "correlation" (was "correlation-lib")
- Added source and javadoc JAR generation
- Added JitPack configuration
- Updated README with installation instructions
- Added JitPack repository to dependency resolution
- Added "install" task for JitPack compatibility
